p: This denotes that not only the surface area is important for EDLCs, but also the particle size distribution and the degree of mesoporosity. This may explain the lower supercapacitive performance of NiCo5/Ag-CX and NiCo10/Ag-CX when compared with NiCo1/Ag-CX, taking into account that high NiCo 2O 4 concentrations may cause permeability reduction and pore-blocking effects [ 44, 45].
